name: The Vehicular Epic
description:
The Vehicular Epic (V.E.) is the modernized version of my 'Need for Madness Revised and Recharged' series. Since then, V.E.'s been overhauled with many improvements like real 3D graphics, full customization of vehicles, and multiplayer L.A.N. games. V.E. is fully open-source.
For more about the game e-mail RyanAlbano1@gmail.com
If you want to play online, or submit vehicles/tracks to the game, join my Discord page:
https://discord.gg/y4tPpsT
